thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: Thomas

author: Thomas
title: Thomas
text: I have had very good experiences ordering from B&H Photo. Shipping times are minimal and this is important if you are at an APO or FPO address. I recently ordered an item from another well-known company on 28 Nov 2016 and to date, 5 Feb 2017 have not received this item and it was a SSD drive. For those of us who order from overseas, this is very important. Beware of those companies who only ship UPS you may not receive it by Christmas. .
